metadata.title: CVE-2018-5950 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the web UI in Mailman before2.1.26 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via auser-options URL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5950` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mailman - 1:2.1.20-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mailman package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.1.20-1ubuntu0.3').
